    <field name="PROCESSTYPES">["Service selection and signing","Service_selection_and_signing:5:63209"]</field>

    </value>
    <value name="FACT_1">

        <field name="display">once</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FACT_2">

        <field name="display">never</field>
        <value name="INPUT_1">

        </value>
        <value name="INPUT_2">

              <block type="entry" id="564" inline="true">
                <value name="KEY">
                  <block type="text" id="565">
                    <field name="TEXT">DisplayName</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="VALUE">

                    <field name="TEXT">$$customername</field>

            <value name="ADD1">

                    <field name="TEXT">PrimaryEmailAddr</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="VALUE">
                  <block type="json_create_with" id="569" inline="false">
                    <mutation items="1"></mutation>
                    <value name="ADD0">
                      <block type="entry" id="570" inline="true">

            </value>
            <value name="ADD2">

                    <field name="TEXT">BillAddr</field>
                  </block>
                </value>

                            <field name="TEXT">Line1</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>

                            <field name="TEXT">$$line1</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="ADD1">
                      <block type="entry" id="579" inline="true">
                        <value name="KEY">

                            <field name="TEXT">City</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>

    </value>
  </block>
</xml>

pe%3D%22end%22%20id%3D%22456%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fxml%3E</documentation><startEvent name="Service selection and signing" id="start"/><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask16" sourceRef="start" id="flow20"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="VIEW - list services users" id="serviceTask16"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_VIEW-listservicesusers_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${LIST_OBJECTSMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask17" sourceRef="serviceTask16" id="flow21"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Selectanaccount_form" name="Select an account" id="userTask17"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask17" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage22"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway18" sourceRef="userTask17" "new"}</conditionExpression></sequenceFlow>  <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Fillcreationform_form" name="Fill creation form" id="userTask19"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask19" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage25"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask20" sourceRef="userTask19" id="flow26"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Create account" id="serviceTask20"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_Createaccount_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${CREATEMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask22" sourceRef="serviceTask20" id="flow27"/><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask21" sourceRef="exclusivegateway18" id="flow28"><conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${outcome != "new"}</conditionExpression></sequenceFlow>  <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Empty" id="serviceTask21"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_Empty_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${DELETEMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask22" sourceRef="serviceTask21" id="flow29"/><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask22" sourceRef="exclusivegateway18" id="flow30"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Selectaplan_form" name="Select a plan" id="userTask22"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask22" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage31"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask23" sourceRef="userTask22" id="flow32"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="VIEW - signing view" id="serviceTask23"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_VIEW-signingview_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${READMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask24" sourceRef="serviceTask23" id="flow33"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Signcontract_form" name="Sign contract" id="userTask24"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask24" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage34"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask25" sourceRef="userTask24" id="flow35"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Viewcontractconfirmation_form" name="View contract confirmation" id="userTask25"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask25" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage36"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="MailTask26" sourceRef="userTask25" id="flow37"/><serviceTask activiti:type="mail" id="MailTask26"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="to"><activiti:expression>${customeremail}</activiti:expression></activiti:field><activiti:field name="from"><activiti:expression>donotreply@point.io</activiti:expression></activiti:field><activiti:field name="subject"><activiti:expression>Contract successfully signed</activiti:expression></activiti:field><activiti:field name="html"><activiti:expression>The contract ${contractname} submitted by ${contractemail} was successfully signed by you and saved.</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="MailTask26" id="flow38"/><endEvent name="end" id="end"/></process></definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Docusign Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <process id="io.point.Docusign_provider" name="Docusign Fact Provider Flow" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
    <serviceTask id="task3" name="Sign" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_Read_Obj_toFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway" default="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow14" name="GET" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task3">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow17" sourceRef="task3" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="default" name="Unsupported" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Default" activiti:formKey="poi_default_view"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask1" name="OAuth2" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow18" name="OAuth" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask1">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "PUT"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow19" sourceRef="servicetask1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="io.point.Docusign_provider" id="BPMNPlane_io.point.Docusign_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="70.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task3" id="BPMNShape_task3">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="30.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="740.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="161.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="220.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="servicetask1" id="BPMNShape_servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="100.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="105.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="181.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
